entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
